about_the_game:
Explore the Vibrant World of Ottoman Punk


This is a journey through a fictional Istanbul that blends traditional Ottoman culture with modern lifestyle. Fight enemies, find allies, uncover mysteries, and explore a world of chaos and survival. We are trying to develop a new direction and a unique experience for players who enjoy RPGs, adventures and action.

Dynamic Storytelling


There's no clear-cut good or bad, only decisions. Your choices will shape the world around you, just like in real life. Your decisions have consequences. You can be diplomatic, or take a more aggressive approach. We give you the freedom to play your way.

Fight Enemies & Befriend Allies


You'll need to fight against enemies to survive. You can also befriend allies who will help you along the way. Your actions will have consequences, and you can choose to be political or aggressive as you see fit. The game's storyline will change according to your behavior, so be careful with the decisions you make.

Solve Mysteries


You have to solve puzzles and unravel the mysteries behind murders and dark relationships between powerful individuals. The game features storytelling and roleplaying elements that enable you to make decisions that will determine your fate in this chaotic world. Will you survive long enough to uncover the truth?

Inventory System and Crafting


Manage your inventory, craft useful items, and use survival mechanics to keep yourself alive. Inventory system and crafting mechanics will enable you to create items that will help you survive.

Discover Hidden Lore & Ottoman Slang


You'll uncover hidden stories and lore by finding clues scattered throughout the city. Also you'll learn some authentic Ottoman street slang that will transport you deeper into this unique world.

Modern and Traditional Arts


The game also features street art and eclectic music elements from real-world artists, adding an authentic touch to the Ottoman punk style. The artwork and design blend together to create a unique and immersive world that players will love to explore.

Are you ready to explore a world where traditional and modern collide, and danger lurks around every corner?
